summary: This document is a New York State law enforcement database query result from July 24, 2019, checking for records on Richard J. EalBarnett. It shows his valid driver's license information and confirms no records in wanted persons, orders of protection, parole, or probation files.

persons.name: Richard J. EalBarnett
persons.context: Individual whose information was queried in multiple New York State law enforcement databases on July 24, 2019, showing a valid driver's license with no criminal records found.

events.title: Law enforcement database query on Richard J. EalBarnett
events.description: Multiple New York State law enforcement databases were queried for records on Richard J. EalBarnett, including driver's license, wanted persons, orders of protection, parole, and probation files.

events.title: Driver's license image capture
events.description: Richard J. EalBarnett's driver's license photo was captured by the New York State DMV.

keyFacts: Richard J. EalBarnett had a valid New York State driver's license (expiring August 9, 2020) as of July 24, 2019.
No records were found for EalBarnett in NYSPIN wanted persons, orders of protection, parole, or probation files.
No NCIC (National Crime Information Center) wanted records were found for EalBarnett.
The database query was conducted on July 24, 2019, at 16:33:24, with immediate response.
EalBarnett's driver's license image was captured on August 6, 2004, and his license required corrective lenses.
